item.title: Jedi vs Sith
item.description:
Jedi vs Sith

The philosophical differences shape tactics and outcomes. Jedi value balance; Sith harness passion and power.

Historical conflicts illustrate the risks of imbalance.

item.title: The Jedi Code
item.description:
The Jedi Code

There are several variants of the Jedi Code used to guide behavior. They emphasize self-discipline and service.

Example principles: serenity, knowledge, harmony, and responsibility.

item.title: Luke Skywalker: From Farmboy to Jedi
item.description:
Luke Skywalker

Luke’s journey from Tatooine to Jedi Master inspired a generation. He emphasized rebuilding the Order with balance.

Notable achievements: confronting darkness and restoring hope.

item.title: Obi-Wan Kenobi: A Brief Biography
item.description:
Obi-Wan Kenobi

Obi-Wan served as a mentor to Anakin Skywalker and later to Luke Skywalker. Known for his calm demeanor and tactical skill.

Key lessons: patience, vigilance, compassion.

item.title: Master Yoda: Wisdom
item.description:
Short Bio

Master Yoda is one of the wisest Jedi. He trained generations of Jedi and emphasized patience, balance, and the living Force.

Key point: patience is a virtue.

Read more posts in the Jedi posts index.
